title: Crew Show!
description: After many weeks of travel everybody is back in the studio for a regular podcast. This week Matt shares his take on the Mercedes GLE63, we discuss the harsh realities of canabalism, an RX300 is freed from its confines, Confederate flags are everywhere, Thad forgets about Ivy league acceptance and we debate the merits of Lamborghini SUVs.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: After many weeks of travel everybody is back in the studio for a regular podcast.
